plot: Released from jail, John Wesley Hardin leaves an account of his life with the local newspaper. It tells of his overly religious father, his resulting life of cards and guns, and his love for his step-sister replaced on her death during a gun fight with that for dance-hall girl Rosie.   Written by  Jeremy Perkins
title: Historia de un condenado

write.role: based on the life of John Wesley Hardin as written by himself
